title: Job-Related Language Proficiency Improvement Course Using Personalized Learning Models

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher language proficiency and understanding of job-related basic terminology
context.additional_context: Targeting in-service professionals to enhance workplace language proficiency, offering personalized content via a learning management system reflecting individual learning patterns

learning_goals: Can design personalized learning pathways through individual language proficiency diagnostics within one week
Can improve job-related language application skills by 20% using LMS-based personalized learning modules
Can monitor their progress and achievement in real time through learning analytics tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
